CR_effector_expansion.description: Massive expansion of effector cells during viral clearance
CR_effector_expansion.evidence: Log2_OR = -4.5 ~ -6.9 (IT vs others), KEGG autoimmune pathways

IT_monocyte_expansion.description: Tolerogenic monocyte accumulation in IT phase

CR_metabolic_shift.description: OXPHOS elevation in CR-specific CD4+ T cells
CR_metabolic_shift.mechanism: High energy demand for effector function

CR_autoimmune_response.description: Strong autoimmune signatures during viral clearance
CR_autoimmune_response.mechanism: Collateral immune activation for HBV elimination
CR_autoimmune_response.evidence: KEGG: GVHD, T1D, thyroiditis, allograft rejection

NK_dynamics.description: NK cell redistribution across disease stages
